title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.20 - Interfering with the duties of port watchmen
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.20 - Interfering with the duties of port watchmen

State Regulations

No person shall, without justification or excuse in law, directly or indirectly, intimidate or inflict any injury, damage, harm, loss or
economic reprisal upon any port watchman in the performance or discharge of his
duties or obligations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
